title: About the players who missed the order and chaos event
body: Well, it's just to aske if the order and chaos event will happen again and if yess when ? could not find it elsewhere in the boards, plz answer me, and thanks for the cool skins RIOT !!

replies.body:
I play this game since 2013 and as far I can tell they never really repeated such kind of events.
Events, there you can get Icons (for example Freljord & Bilgewater (lore events), old Lunar Revel & Snowdowns, but even such thing as the Demacia/Zhaun/Piltover icons, there you basically have to click one link to get it) are  almost always exclusive.
We only icon they are ever brought back was Slay Belle Surprise Icon from Snowdown 2013.
HOWEVER, with the mission system I could imagine we actually could get some event exclusive icons.
Otherwise, we chances are low that they gonna repeat the event in near future and if, not like this.
The event will never return. We will HOPEFULLY get a lot of similar ones, however.

Yes, please. Having an event with 2 opposing sides represented by champions is great.
And please let a Zaun or Piltover champion represent one side in the next event. ;__;

The point of the event was based around the release of the yas/riven skins.

So no, this event will never happen again.


There will be similar events in the future based off different skins/lore
